member_organisations:
Affiliates of PPI AG: 
PPI France SAS (participation of PPI AG: 52%) 
PPI Schweiz GmbH (participation of PPI AG: 51%)
fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Consumers, Single market, Fraud prevention
eu_initiatives: EU 2015/2366 (Payment Service Directive 2) and any other initiative, policy and legislative file concerning payments or retail financial services.
goals__remit: PPI AG is working as a consulting and software company for banks, insurances and financial service providers. In order to bring projects to a successful conclusion, PPI AG combines expert knowledge with technological proficiency. PPI AG follows the code of conduct of the International Chamber of Commerce for the economy.
